:::{#hero-heading}

I am the Co-Founder and CEO of [Spiral Works](https://spiralworks.ai). We are an AI research lab developing creative superintelligence that can automate AI R&D. 

I lead our research team studying the algorithmic and theoretical foundations of creativity.

Reach out to join us at [join@spiralworks.ai](mailto:join@spiralworks.ai)


## Experience

- Visiting Researcher, Simons Institute for the Theory of Computing

## Education

- BS, Computer Science, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign
